intent_atoms.description: Update SidebarPattern to support NavigationSplitScaffold integration while maintaining backward compatibility.
Update InspectorPattern to support NavigationSplitScaffold integration and enhanced accessibility when inside a scaffold.
Update ToolbarPattern to provide navigation controls (sidebar/inspector toggles) when inside a NavigationSplitScaffold, with keyboard shortcuts and accessibility labels.
SidebarPattern must detect presence of $navigationModel via @Environment and render only sidebar content in scaffold mode, otherwise render full NavigationSplitView.
SidebarPattern must provide enhanced accessibility label "File Browser in Navigation" when inside a scaffold.
SidebarPattern must remain fully functional without a navigationModel (standalone) and not produce runtime errors.
InspectorPattern must detect $navigationModel via @Environment and adjust accessibility labels to "{title} Inspector" with hint "Detail inspector within navigation" when inside scaffold.
